Rooftop Bar

Climb upstairs to Footscray’s numero uno rooftop bar. Palm trees and pinacoladas await you as you’re transported to this CBD oasis.

From Tuesday to Sunday you can play, dance, drink whilst you watch the sun set over the city's skyline.

Opening Hours

  • MON Closed
  • TUE 2PM - 1AM
  • WED 2PM - 1AM
  • THU 2PM - 1AM
  • FRI 2PM - 1AM
  • SAT 2PM - 1AM
  • SUN 2PM - 1AM

About Chambers District

How can one development change the face of the west? Simple. By transforming a derelict two story supermarket into a food, retail and entertainment hub, right in the heart of Footscray Mall.

Chambers District will reactivate and reinvent the notorious Maddern Square, known for it’s colourful past, all through a collection of retail spaces, events and activations.


Tenancy A
Counterweight Tenancy B

Events

Celebrating the vibrant culture that “The Festival City” has to offer, Chambers District brings together the west’s best local designers, artists and musicians in a series of curated events, markets and mini festivals.

Events schedule is jam packed with entertainment including:

  • Creators Arts Market
  • Footscray’s First Bulldog Festival
  • Music Events
  • and many more.

Tenancy A

With all the foot traffic of the Footscray mall, your business will have the most exposure possible on this 48 m2 space!

Please contact leasing@chambersdistrict.com for all leasing enquiries.

Counterweight Vinyl & Espresso

Who said vinyl is dead? Setting up home in Chambers District, is Counterweight Vinyl & Espresso, Footscray's first and finest record store.

And if finding a rare EP ain't your thing, then swing by for your caffeine fix at their espresso bar.


Counterweight Vinyl & Espresso

Opening Hours

  • MON Closed
  • TUE 8AM - 5:30PM
  • WED 8AM - 5:30PM
  • THU 8AM - 5:30PM
  • FRI 8AM - 5:30PM
  • SAT 9AM - 5:30PM
  • SUN 11AM - 4PM
